jump_scares.spoiler: There is a loud bang (like a gunshot)
A bulldozer crashes through the house
C appears deep in thought for several seconds before M bangs on the window and startles him
Hank jumps at Abby from the side
After Hank says “you should get that thing off him before he floats away” there is a car horn blast and a cut to Hank firing a gun
As Abby is pulling the hammock there is a cut to Hank falling out of bed
The trap Hank set suddenly goes off
As Hank’s gunshot lights up the area the monster is seen kneeling on the ground
While Hank is singing, the monster suddenly lunges at him
The beast grabs the father on the shoulder
There is a sudden thud
The zombie suddenly gets up and growls at Anna
A bunch of zombies suddenly burst through the wall
After the end of a musical track, there is a sudden cut to Anna jumping out of a kiddie pool
A zombie lunges out from behind the christmas trees
After Chris closes the door there is a loud cut to Anna running through some plastic curtains
After the red ribbon flies across the screen a zombie santa appears behind it and jumps towards the camera
A screeching bat-like Dracula suddenly jumps into the frame
Dracula suddenly breaks out of a box
The ghost of Edith’s mother reaches out and touches Edith on the bed
The ghost of Edith’s mother turns around and screams at Edith
The ghost reaches through the door and grabs Edith. [Video]
A ghost appears at the half opened door and pulls it shut
A ghost appears out of the ground and begins crawling down the hallway towards Edith
A silhouette moves past the bedroom window
Edith is pulled to the floor by an unseen force
The ghost in the bathtub suddenly moves
Lucille lunges at Edith with a cleaver
While kissing Alex, Dan is shocked to discover that Alex has slit her wrists
Dan jumps in the parking garage when the car alarm goes off
Beth screams upon finding Ellen’s rabbit boiling in a pot on the stove
Beth slams into a car while frantically looking for her daughter Ellen
Alex jumps towards Dan with a knife when he threatens to expose her
Dan pulls the tea kettle off the stove and hears Beth screaming
Alex emerges from the tub screaming and wielding a knife
A loud slamming noise scares the boy, causing him to drop the bottle of wine
The boy stands up and gets grabbed on the head by the butcher
The butcher kicks the door open
While running through a hallway the butcher steps in front of the girl
While Millie is walking through her highschool, someone jumps at her and screams as a joke
Millie peaks out from underneath the bleachers, and the butcher jumps in front of her
Ryler rushes out of the bathroom and once she gets to the door the butcher (in Millie’s body) steps out in front of her
While Millie (in the butcher’s body) is walking through a haunted house, a toy ghost flies out at her from the side
A knife pierces through the door
Cooper jumps at Don and barks after he calls for him
Don opens his eyes to find a girl with a distorted face over him
The doorbell unexpectedly rings during a quiet scene
The girl looks up at the camera and shrieks
Liz sees an eye in the drain
A man jumps up from a bush as Ryan walks past
After Ryan opens a storage cupboard, Samar puts his hand on Ryan’s shoulder giving him a scare
A person in a baby mask suddenly appears behind Ryan
After Tree and Carter check the cupboard and find it empty, Babyface suddenly appears behind Ryan
Babyface suddenly appears from behind some Babyface costumes that Ryan is walking through
Babyface suddenly tackles the security guard escorting Tree
The lights turn back on and Dr. Butler is standing right by Carter
A hooded person wearing a mask drops down behind Tree
Tree turns around and the masked killer is standing in the doorway
The masked killer can now be seen in the mirror standing behind Tree
The television turns back on as Tree approaches the shower curtain
The masked killer appears from behind Tree
The lights in the hospital turn back on and Tree’s professor (Gregory) is now standing beside Carter
Gregory opens a door, startling Tree as she tries to sneak down the hospital hallway, seconds later the masked killer appears behind Gregory
The police officer is suddenly hit by a car as he listens to his Walkie-talkie
As the young woman and Jake begin to kiss, there is suddenly a cut to an old man watching them with loud echoing noises
Abby suddenly attacks the man who picked her up
The police officer attempts to break down the door, frightening Owen
Owen shouts at the police officer, causing him to turn around, Abby then jumps up and attacks the police officer from behind
The store owner starts yelling “Whoa!” as an item is knocked over
Odd turns around and a faceless man in a bowling shirt is in front of him. [Video]
A man gets hit by a truck suddenly
A cold force suddenly radiates out from the door
Odd’s hand is suddenly pulled into a hole in the door
A large number of bodachs suddenly appear in the room
Something bangs on the door that Stormy is standing behind
A bodach pops up in front of the camera
Odd closes the fridge door to reveal the ghost of Bob standing behind. [Video]
A masked man appears at a window
As Varner prepares to shoot Odd in the van, a bodach suddenly comes out of the window and screeches at Odd
Mr. Darcy suddenly attacks Mr. Kingston
Annabelle turns around to reveal half her face is rotting
A zombie’s head is suddenly blown off
Jane kicks Elizabeth in the back
A zombie’s head is blown off
A man is suddenly pulled away from the door by a zombie
A zombie pulls Mr. Bingley off the staircase
As Leslie is about to open a box, Victor suddenly slams his hand on it
While Leslie is walking around in the dark, a sudden banging noise startles her
As Mildred is walking out of a closet, Victor suddenly jumps her from the side and grabs her
There is suddenly a loud flash of several spooky images accompanied by a loud sound effect
Oz has a vision where he sees a clone of himself slowly approaching him. Suddenly, there is a cut to the clone’s face as he begins to scream
There is a sudden flash of Oz’s clone screaming
Louise attempts to bite Evan
The main character, Mara, leans down from her desk and a few seconds later an explosion happens right off screen, splattering the room with blood
While driving, one of the drug dealers suddenly explodes
The student at the front of the classroom suddenly explodes
As Emily stops to catch her breath, Randall suddenly taps her on the shoulder, startling her
Brent is grabbed by Lola from behind while looking down the hole
Lola’s scrapbook flies at the windshield while Holly is driving
While the camera slowly zooms in on Lola there is a cut to the car right in front of her when they collide
As Leilani and Jibran argue in the car, a cyclist suddenly slams into the windshield
After the two get back into the car, a man suddenly strikes the window pane and frightens Jibran
As Lizzie sits on a bed nursing her amputated arm, we get 3 short sharp flash backs to Lizzie screaming which may startle some sensitive viewers
Accompanied by a low pitched sound effect Milo suddenly attacks a girl
Milo imagines hinself suddenly stabbing Sophie in the neck (a low pitched sound effect plays at the same time)
Elisa touches the outside of the tank when the creature bangs against it
The creature suddenly roars at Elisa as she offers it an egg
Fiona looks up and screams suddenly
During a flashback, a sock puppet briefly appears on screen accompanied by an electronic noise that may startle some viewers
Lisa backs into Jerry
A figure in red passes by the base of a ladder
Lucius suddenly grabs Ivy’s outstretched hand as a creature approaches
Ivy falls into a hole
The creature with the red cloak suddenly runs at Ivy
A personal trainer zombie attacks the glass
Body parts fall from the fire escape and land on a dumpster
A pack of zombies, led by R, bust through the pharmacy lab doors
Zombie dad makes a run and lunges at Perry before being shot dead
The skeleton eaters jump and claw at the door as R and Julie escape
M runs over three skeleton eaters with a luggage cart
Julie’s dad pulls a gun on R
A dead body/zombie jumps on Julie
(-1:11:10) A quiet scene suddenly cuts to a loud ventilator
(-1:05:14) A hand suddenly comes out of the hole in the decapitated head
(-45:04) As Will opens the cupboard a cockroach flies out
(-44:02)  The man at the table suddenly spits out blood
(-33:45) The creature jumps at the camera
(-30:49) As Will enters the bedroom he sees a mask accompanied by a sound effect
